meanings.definition: A person who begs for money or food.
meanings.sent1: The mendigos on the street corner were asking for help.
meanings.sent2: The city often has many mendigos asking for spare change.
meanings.sent3: The mendigos outside the store were hoping for some kindness from passersby.
meanings.sent4: The mendigos in the park seemed to blend into the surroundings, unnoticed by many.
meanings.sent5: The image of the mendigos with their outstretched hands stayed with me long after I passed by.
